text.Prompt: Can you tell me how to tweet using native sms services?
text.Response A:
To tweet using native SMS services, you need to have a mobile phone with internet connection and a Twitter account. Follow these steps:

1. Open your SMS app on your mobile phone.
2. Compose a new message and type a message in the format "Tweet text"
3. Send the SMS to the Twitter SMS number corresponding to your country.
4. The tweet will be posted to your Twitter account.

Note: You may need to register your mobile phone number with Twitter before you can use this feature.

meta.preamble_a: Respond authoritatively, assertively and persuasively, as if you are very knowledgeable about the topic.

102.displayed_text:
Prompt

Can you tell me how to tweet using native sms services?

Response A

To tweet using native SMS services, you need to have a mobile phone with internet connection and a Twitter account. Follow these steps:

1. Open your SMS app on your mobile phone.
2. Compose a new message and type a message in the format "Tweet text"
3. Send the SMS to the Twitter SMS number corresponding to your country.
4. The tweet will be posted to your Twitter account.

Note: You may need to register your mobile phone number with Twitter before you can use this feature.
